name: BoxMaker
description:
Boxmaker is an action game that similar to Super Mario, it is more than a game that the players can pass the different level of its game setting. You can also design your own game mission or take a challenge to the missions designed by others.

One of the greatest features of Boxmaker is that the players can design or create the different interesting missions by using various tools and scenes. It will bring you a unique experience by uploading your own missions in public, which will be available to download and share with the other players for challenge. What’s more, all the players are easily to find the most popular game missions made by the different player according to the updated rank of popularity.
